column4: can anyone help me configure a modem in ubuntu... finding it difficult
USB or serial? Using wvdial?
what error/problem are you getting?
hmm
can you pastebin the output from wvdial and /etc/wvdial.conf (edit out personal details) ?
it's been a while, but I may spot something :)
just stick the number infront of the number?
there should be a way to make it wait (looking at man wvdial)
is it listed in  /media
yes there is cdrom0 in media but nothing in it
yeah, can't hurt
what was?
, faulty disk or drive is my only thought atm
thought so too. its probably the drive. plays some dvds
what's weird is that my macbooks dvd rive is also not working
a lot of cd drive related issues atm don't you think?
*nods*
yeah, that is a bit odd
could it have something to do with an update?
possible, I did get a 24-19 kernel update when I already had that *shrugs*
should I try mounting manually?
no medium found... guess not
bummer, sorry. Try the disk elsewhere, if it works it's your drive
when in doubt restart :)
